contentrichtext.text: {{one source|date=June 2011}} {{nihongo|'''Kyōko Hikami'''|氷上 恭子|Hikami Kyōko|born January 11, 1969}} is a Japanese [[Seiyū|voice actress]] who was born in [[Kobe]]. She is part of the voice actress trio ''Furil'' which also consists of [[Wedding Peach]] voice castmates [[Yūko Miyamura]] and [[Yukana]]. ==Notable voice roles== *Sudou in [[Atashinchi]] *Haruka Shiranui in [[Ayakashi Ninden Kunoichiban]] *Ellis in [[Battle Arena Toshinden (anime)|Battle Arena Toshinden]] *Batch in [[Mon Colle Knights]] *Hinoki Sai in [[Betterman (TV series)|Betterman]] *Nina in [[Breath of Fire]] III, IV and V *Maria in [[Bakuretsu Tenshi|Burst Angel]] (Japanese ver.) *Yuki Sakurakouji in [[Code:_Breaker#Anime|Code:Breaker]] *Hikaru Usada in [[Di Gi Charat]] *Lisa in [[Final Fantasy: Unlimited]] *Ayumi Momozono in [[Fresh Pretty Cure!]] *Cyberdoll Sara in [[Hand Maid May]] *Kyoko Himeji in [[High School Girls]] *Juli Bahana in [[Infinite Ryvius]] *Cullen Lucciora (alt. spelling: ''Karen Luchiora''), also in [[Infinite Ryvius]] *Keira Hagai in the [[Jak and Daxter|Jak & Daxter]] series (Japanese ver.) *Cream and Juken in [[Juuni Senshi Bakuretsu Eto Ranger]] *Luna in [[Lunar: Silver Star Story|LUNAR: Silver Star Story]] *[[List of The Last Blade characters#Hibiki Takane|Hibiki Takane]] in [[The Last Blade|The Last Blade 2]] and [[Capcom vs. SNK 2]] *[[Erika (Pokémon)|Erika]] in [[Pokémon]] *Marin Aoki in [[Seifuku Densetsu Pretty Fighter]], Seifuku Densetsu Pretty Fighter X and [[FIST (1996 video game)|FIST]] *Harp in [[Ryusei no Rockman]] *Urara Kasuga in [[Sakura Diaries]] *Tsubaki Takamura in the ''[[Sakura Wars]]'' series *Mami in [[Sister Princess]] *[[List of To Heart series characters#Kotone Himekawa|Kotone Himekawa]] in [[ToHeart]] *Debora in [[Trouble Chocolate]] *Asumi Akiyama in [[True Tears]] *Cacao in [[Knights of Ramune|VS Knight Ramune & 40 FRESH]] *Momoko Hanasaki/Wedding Peach in [[Wedding Peach]] *[[List of Witch Hunter Robin characters#Yurika Dōjima|Yurika Dōjima]] in [[Witch Hunter Robin]] *Reiko Hatsuyama in [[Spiral: Suiri no Kizuna]] *Setsuna Saizuki in [[Evil Zone]] (aka Eretzvaju) *Dormin (female voice) in [[Shadow of the Colossus]] *Chiharu Kise in [[Smile PreCure!]] *Penelope in [[Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves]] *Ruka Hyo in [[The Story of Saiunkoku]] *[[list of Samurai Shodown characters from 3D series#Saya|Saya]] in [[Samurai Shodown: Warriors Rage]] *Topanga in [[Boy Meets World]] (Japanese Dub) ==External links== * {{ann|people|807}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Hikami, Kyoko | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = 1969 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }}
